alert.note: Alert for Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 5:07PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Merced County through 530 PM PDT... At 507 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Los Banos, or 22 miles south of Atwater, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Los Banos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota
